languages.text: "Знай меру. Прикончил{mf||а} разок — и хватит. Теперь это моя игрушка, и убивать его буду только я. Столько раз, сколько захочу".
"Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."
languages.original_text: "Знай меру. Прикончил{mf||а} разок — и хватит. Теперь это моя игрушка, и убивать его буду только я. Столько раз, сколько захочу".

traits.locale_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my toy now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my toy now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my toy now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “别太放肆了。你杀了他一次，也到此为止了。他现在是我的玩物，而且只有我能杀他。我想杀他多少次，就能杀他多少次。”
languages.original_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."

traits.locale_text: “别太放肆了。你杀了他一次，也到此为止了。他现在是我的玩物，而且只有我能杀他。我想杀他多少次，就能杀他多少次。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «No te precipites. Lo mataste una vez y basta. Ahora es mi juguete y solo yo lo mataré. Tantas veces como quiera».
languages.original_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."

traits.locale_text: «No te precipites. Lo mataste una vez y basta. Ahora es mi juguete y solo yo lo mataré. Tantas veces como quiera».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「早まるな。貴様は一度殺した、それで十分だろう。こいつは私のおもちゃだから、殺せるのは私だけ。何度でも、満足ゆくまで殺してやる」
languages.original_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."

traits.locale_text: 「早まるな。貴様は一度殺した、それで十分だろう。こいつは私のおもちゃだから、殺せるのは私だけ。何度でも、満足ゆくまで殺してやる」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Übertreibt es nicht. Einmal habt Ihr ihn getötet, dabei bleibt es. Er ist jetzt mein Spielzeug, und ich werde ihn töten. So oft, wie mir beliebt."
languages.original_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."

traits.locale_text: "Übertreibt es nicht. Einmal habt Ihr ihn getötet, dabei bleibt es. Er ist jetzt mein Spielzeug, und ich werde ihn töten. So oft, wie mir beliebt."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Ne vous emballez pas. Vous l'avez tué une fois et nous en resterons là. C'est mon jouet, désormais, et moi seul ai le droit de le tuer. Autant de fois que j'en aurai envie. »
languages.original_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous emballez pas. Vous l'avez tué une fois et nous en resterons là. C'est mon jouet, désormais, et moi seul ai le droit de le tuer. Autant de fois que j'en aurai envie. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Haddini bil. Bir kere öldürdün, yeter. O artık benim oyuncağım. Ölecekse de ben öldüreceğim. Hem de istediğim kadar."
languages.original_text: "Don't get ahead of yourself. You killed him once, and that's it. He's my plaything now, and I'll be the only one to kill him. As many times as I want."

traits.locale_text: "Haddini bil. Bir kere öldürdün işte, yeter. Artık benim oyuncağım o. Ölecekse de ben öldüreceğim. Hem de istediğim kadar."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
